mana_box.page.manaBox0:
The $(item)Mana Box$(0) is a portable Mana container with ten times the Mana reserve of $(item)Mana Pool$(0), It also preserves its Mana after destruction. At the same time, it can let other items draw Mana from it like $(item)Mana Tablet$(0).
It can be stained using the same method as $(item)Mana Pool$(0).
